articles.title: Worker killed in Revere after falling from third-floor roof, DA says
articles.description:
A man died Tuesday after falling from a third-floor roof of a house in Revere, officials said.

The post Worker killed in Revere after falling from third-floor roof, DA says appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Webster man allegedly used alias to scam tire shop out of $15K
articles.description:
Jason Dwinell, 37, allegedly used the name “David Young” to set up a fake business account with a tire shop in Auburn, according to police.  

The post Webster man allegedly used alias to scam tire shop out of $15K appeared first on Boston.com.
